entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Fog patches developing late in the evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
